senses.sense_definition: The scientific study of the structure of animals and plants achieved through dissection.

examples.text: The biology students learned about internal organs through careful <w>biotomy</w> in the lab.
Early medical researchers relied heavily on <w>biotomy</w> to understand the complex systems of the body.

senses.sense_definition: The practice of performing operations on live animals for the purpose of experimentation or scientific research.

examples.text: Many activists campaigned against <w>biotomy</w> due to the suffering it caused to living creatures.
The scientist defended the use of <w>biotomy</w> as necessary for advancing medical knowledge.
